thread.title: Zip Aviation Flies Lisa Vanderpump to Bella Magazine Hamptons Party
thread.title_full: Zip Aviation Flies Lisa Vanderpump to Bella Magazine Hamptons Party

author: Meagan Dooley
title: Zip Aviation Flies Lisa Vanderpump to Bella Magazine Hamptons Party
text:
Zip Aviation will fly “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” and “Vanderpump Rules” star and restaurateur Lisa Vanderpump to Southampton Saturday via helicopter for Bella Magazine’s Annual 2015 White Party. Vanderpump and family have recurring roles on both Bravo series produced in Los Angeles. Zip Aviation will fly Vanderpump and guests in a brand-new Bell407GX helicopter, an enhanced version of the Bell 407. Bell Helicopter argues the 407GX is the safest commercial helicopter in the executive charter market, with a full “glass cockpit” providing greater situational awareness to pilots. Garmin’s G1000 “glass cockpit” features two 10.4” high-resolution LCD screens that provide pilots live streaming information on traffic, weather, terrain, systems, and more.
Zip Aviation is donating 100% of helicopter tour and charter profit generated from the event to the Cleveland Clinic Lou Ruvo Center for Brain Health, a state-of-the-art clinic that provides care for cognitive disorders and family members of those who suffer from them.
“We hope to raise a great amount of money for brain health research, and we are honored to fly Lisa and Ken to such a prestigious event,” said Zip CEO and Chief Pilot, Itai Shoshani.
Vanderpump is featured on the cover of Bella’s July/August Hamptons issue, where she poses for the camera in pink couture with her famous dog Giggy. Her husband Ken Todd will accompany her with dog Giggy to the party of 300 invited guests.
Zip Aviation is sponsoring the annual party for the second year in a row. Last year’s Bella White Party was hosted by Laura Prepon, star of “Orange is the New Black” and “That 70’s show”. Zip Aviation provided her helicopter charter services as well.
Those who wish to donate can contact Zip Aviation to book a tour or charter in the month of August and mention “Bella Magazine White Party”. More information on the Lou Ruvo Center for Brain Health can be found at KeepMemoryAlive.org , and more information about Lisa Vanderpump can be found at LisaVanderpump.com .
More information about Zip Aviation can be found at http://www.ZipAviation.com , and more information about Bella Magazine can be found at BellaNYC.com .
